thread.title: Japan Calls Upon BlackRock in Bid to Encourage Corporate Investment
thread.title_full: Japan Calls Upon BlackRock in Bid to Encourage Corporate Investment - WSJ

author: Eleanor Warnock
title: Japan Calls Upon BlackRock in Bid to Encourage Corporate Investment
text:
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe is asking the world’s biggest asset-manager, BlackRock Inc., for some help in getting Japanese companies to spend their hoards of cash.
Mr. Abe’s government invited a senior executive from the firm to speak with public and private sector officials at a meeting at the prime minister’s residence Friday, according to people with knowledge of the meeting. BlackRock’s chief product officer, Richard...
